Docs.summary: Specifies combinations of modifier and console keys that can interrupt the current process.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ConsoleCancelEventArgs.SpecialKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns the ConsoleSpecialKey enumeration type.
Simultaneously pressing certain key combinations signals the operating system to interrupt the currently running process. The two valid key combinations are <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName> plus BREAK (CTRL+BREAK) and <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName> plus <xref:System.ConsoleKey?displayProperty=fullName> (CTRL+C).
